issue.title: N4415 Simple Contracts for C++, N4435 Proposing Contract Attributes, N4378 Language Support for Contract Assertions, N4379 FAQ about N4378, Language Support for Contract Assertions, N4253, N4135 Language Support for Runtime Contract Validation
issue.submitter: J. Lakos, A. Zakharov, A. Beels, N. Myers

discussion.p: Discussed at length in Urbana. In general, various paper authors are encourage to do further work together on contract programming. See also issue , and .
Discussed in Lenexa. EWG's guidance was to allow contracts on both declarations and definitions, and to unify the proposals.
